channel.description: Engineering & Design Portfolio of Lahiru Maramba

item.title: Focals Smart-Glasses Retail Demo
item.description: A demo experience on Focals smart-glasses to showcase features of the product to potential customers.

item.title: OnTrack
item.description: A mobile application design that helps you keep track of important annual events such as anniversaries and birthdays.

item.title: Cadence
item.description: Your body is the controller! Cadence is a rhythm game in which players tap along to the beats of a song on their thighs, and where certain beats are captured by highÂ­ five-ing their teammate.

item.title: Prototyping The Future of Smart Glasses
item.description: Prototypes and early features built for Focals Smart Glasses at North Inc. Including Amazon Alexa integration, Speech to Text, and Screenshot Share.

item.title: MagicWand
item.description: A handheld device with a fully cylindrical user interface that has a wide range of possible applications, including the use of as a game controller.
